get:/ddms/{id}: Get a DDMS registration with the given id. Required roles: 'users.datalake.viewers' or 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
delete:/ddms/{id}: Delete a DDMS registration with the given id. Required roles: 'users.datalake.admins'
post:/ddms: Create a DDMS registration using an OpenApi spec V3 document. Required roles: 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
get:/ddms: Query for DDMS registrations allowing retrievals by type. Required roles: 'users.datalake.viewers' or 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
get:/ddms/{id}/{type}/{localid}: Get a Single DDMS record id. Required roles: 'users.datalake.viewers' or 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
get:/action/{id}: Get an action registration with the given id. Required roles: 'users.datalake.viewers' or 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
delete:/action/{id}: Delete an action registration with the given id. Required role: 'users.datalake.admins'
post:/action: Create an action registration. Required role: 'users.datalake.admins'
post:/action:test: Test an action registration. Required roles: 'users.datalake.viewers' or 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
post:/action:retrieve: Query for action registrations and substitutes any action with the given parameters
Retrieve an action registration. Required roles: 'users.datalake.viewers' or 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
post:/subscription: Create a subscription. Required roles: 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
get:/subscription/{id}: Get a subscription with its Id. Required role: 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
delete:/subscription/{id}: Delete a subscription with its Id. Required role: 'users.datalake.admins'
put:/subscription/{id}/secret: Update secret for a subscription. Required role: 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
get:/topics: List all topics that you can create a subscription for, along with the corresponding sample messages. Required role: 'users.datalake.editors' or 'users.datalake.admins'
get:/info: For deployment available public `/info` endpoint,  which provides build and git related information.
